category-def.name: turmeric_core
category-def.label: Turmeric Core
category-def.description: Turmeric Core contains the ui and core components for the turmeric eclipse plugin. This includes extension points for adopters wishing to extend the turmeric eclipse plugins for additional functionality.

category-def.name: turmeric_maven_integration
category-def.label: Turmeric Maven Integration
category-def.description: Provides integration for Maven and m2Eclipse.

category-def.name: turmeric_legacy
category-def.label: Turmeric Legacy Feature
category-def.description: This feature includes functionality for working with projects in the legacy format. These projects use source folders in the format of src, gen-src, gen-meta-src, gen-web-content, etc. Install this feature to use Turmeric with these projects.
